Articles.Content:
I have notice over the past week or so that images on the forum are being cut off at the bottom.

Example page

 

For me the small index images are fine but the full sized images seem to be cut off on the bottom. I am use Firefox browser 47.0.1 also tried with edge browser.

The question is, is this normal? is anyone else experiencing this?
Somewhat normal. Imgur has updated their software and embeds are lagging a bit behind on getting fixed, it's being worked on.
